00041 #define ZCL_TIME_CLUSTER_DEF_ZERO_VALUE     0x00000000
00042 #define ZCL_TIME_CLUSTER_DEF_INVALID_VALUE  0xffffffff
00043 #define ZCL_TIME_ZONE_MIN_VALUE             -86400
00044 #define ZCL_TIME_ZONE_MAX_VALUE             86400
00045 #define ZCL_DST_SHIFT_MIN_VALUE             -86400
00046 #define ZCL_DST_SHIFT_MAX_VALUE             86400
00047 /***************************************************************************/
00050 #define ZCL_TIME_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT      11
00051 //The Time and TimeStatus attributes
00052 
00053 /***************************************************************************/
00056 #define ZCL_TIME_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT      1
00057 //There is no any attributes at client cluster side
00058 
00059 /***************************************************************************/
00062 #define ZCL_TIME_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT        0
00063 //There is no any commands at client cluster side
00064 
00066 #define ZCL_TIME_CLUSTER_SERVER_TIME_ATTRIBUTE_ID             CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0000)
00067 
00068 #define ZCL_TIME_CLUSTER_SERVER_TIME_STATUS_ATTRIBUTE_ID      CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0001)
00069 
00070 #define ZCL_TIME_CLUSTER_SERVER_TIME_ZONE_ATTRIBUTE_ID        CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0002)
00071 
00072 #define ZCL_TIME_CLUSTER_SERVER_DST_START_ATTRIBUTE_ID        CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0003)
00073 
00074 #define ZCL_TIME_CLUSTER_SERVER_DST_END_ATRIBUTE_ID           CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0004)
00075 
00076 #define ZCL_TIME_CLUSTER_SERVER_DST_SHIFT_ATTRIBUTE_ID        CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0005)
00077 
00078 #define ZCL_TIME_CLUSTER_SERVER_STANDARD_TIME_ATTRIBUTE_ID    CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0006)
00079 
00080 #define ZCL_TIME_CLUSTER_SERVER_LOCAL_TIME_ATTRIBUTE_ID       CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0007)
00081 
00082 #define ZCL_TIME_CLUSTER_SERVER_LAST_SET_TIME_ATTRIBUTE_ID    CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0008)
00083 
00084 #define ZCL_TIME_CLUSTER_SERVER_VALID_UNTIL_TIME_ATTRIBUTE_ID CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0009)
00085 
00086 //Attribute Ids of Basic Cluster Information
00087 #define ZCL_TIME_CLUSTER_GLOBAL_CLUSTER_VERSION_ATTRIBUTE_ID                          CCPU_TO_LE16(0xfffd)
00088 
00089 /***************************************************************************/
00101 #define ZCL_DEFINE_TIME_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES()\
00102   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE_WITH_BOUNDARY(time, ZCL_READWRITE_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_TIME_CLUSTER_SERVER_TIME_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_UTC_TIME_DATA_TYPE_ID, 0x00000000, 0xFFFFFFFE),\
00103   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE_WITH_BOUNDARY(timeStatus, ZCL_READWRITE_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_TIME_CLUSTER_SERVER_TIME_STATUS_ATTRIBUTE_ID,  ZCL_8BIT_BITMAP_DATA_TYPE_ID, 0x00, 0x0F),\
00104   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE_WITH_BOUNDARY(timeZone, ZCL_READWRITE_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_TIME_CLUSTER_SERVER_TIME_ZONE_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_S32BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID, ZCL_TIME_ZONE_MIN_VALUE, ZCL_TIME_ZONE_MAX_VALUE),\
00105   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE_WITH_BOUNDARY(dstStart, ZCL_READWRITE_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_TIME_CLUSTER_SERVER_DST_START_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_U32BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID, 0x00000000, 0xFFFFFFFE),\
00106   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE_WITH_BOUNDARY(dstEnd, ZCL_READWRITE_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_TIME_CLUSTER_SERVER_DST_END_ATRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_U32BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID, 0x00000000, 0xFFFFFFFE),\
00107   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE_WITH_BOUNDARY(dstShift, ZCL_READWRITE_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_TIME_CLUSTER_SERVER_DST_SHIFT_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_S32BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID, ZCL_DST_SHIFT_MIN_VALUE, ZCL_DST_SHIFT_MAX_VALUE),\
00108   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE_WITH_BOUNDARY(standardTime, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_TIME_CLUSTER_SERVER_STANDARD_TIME_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_U32BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID, 0x00000000, 0xFFFFFFFE),\
00109   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE_WITH_BOUNDARY(localTime, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_TIME_CLUSTER_SERVER_LOCAL_TIME_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_U32BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID, 0x00000000, 0xFFFFFFFE),\
00110   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE_WITH_BOUNDARY(lastSetTime, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_TIME_CLUSTER_SERVER_LAST_SET_TIME_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_UTC_TIME_DATA_TYPE_ID, 0x00000000, 0xFFFFFFFF),\
00111   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE_WITH_BOUNDARY(validUntilTime, ZCL_READWRITE_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_TIME_CLUSTER_SERVER_VALID_UNTIL_TIME_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_UTC_TIME_DATA_TYPE_ID, 0x00000000, 0xFFFFFFFF),\
00112   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(clusterVersion, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_TIME_CLUSTER_GLOBAL_CLUSTER_VERSION_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_U16BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID)
00113     
00114 #define ZCL_DEFINE_TIME_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES() \
00115   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(clusterVersion, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_TIME_CLUSTER_GLOBAL_CLUSTER_VERSION_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_U16BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID)     
00116 /***************************************************************************/
00136 #define TIME_CLUSTER_ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands)                                                    \
00137   {                                                                                                                       \
00138     .id = TIME_CLUSTER_ID,                                                                                                \
00139     .options = {.type = ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY},                  \
00140     .attributesAmount = ZCL_TIME_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT,                                                        \
00141     .attributes = (uint8_t *) clattributes,                                                                               \
00142     .commandsAmount = ZCL_TIME_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT,                                                                   \
00143     .commands = (uint8_t *) clcommands                                                                                    \
00144   }
00145 
00146 #define TIME_CLUSTER_ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE_FLASH(clattributes, clcommands)                                              \
00147   {                                                                                                                       \
00148     .id = TIME_CLUSTER_ID,                                                                                                \
00149     .options = {.type = ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY},                  \
00150     .attributesAmount = ZCL_TIME_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT,                                                        \
00151     .attributes = (uint8_t *) clattributes,                                                                               \
00152     .commandsAmount = ZCL_TIME_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT,                                                                   \
00153     .commands = (FLASH_PTR uint8_t *) clcommands                                                                                    \
00154   }
00155 
00156 /***************************************************************************/
00171 #define TIME_CLUSTER_ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands)                                                    \
00172   {                                                                                                                       \
00173     .id = TIME_CLUSTER_ID,                                                                                                \
00174     .options = {.type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY },                 \
00175     .attributesAmount = ZCL_TIME_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT,                                                        \
00176     .attributes = (uint8_t *) clattributes,                                                                               \
00177     .commandsAmount = ZCL_TIME_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT,                                                                   \
00178     .commands = (uint8_t *) clcommands                                                                                    \
00179   }

00184     .options = {.type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY },                 \
00185     .attributesAmount = ZCL_TIME_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT,                                                        \
00186     .attributes = (uint8_t *) clattributes,                                                                               \
00187     .commandsAmount = ZCL_TIME_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT,                                                                   \
00188     .commands = (FLASH_PTR uint8_t *) clcommands                                                                                    \
00189   }

00191 #define DEFINE_TIME_CLUSTER(cltype, clattributes, clcommands) TIME_CLUSTER_##cltype(clattributes, clcommands)
00192 #define DEFINE_TIME_CLUSTER_FLASH(cltype, clattributes, clcommands) TIME_CLUSTER_##cltype##_FLASH(clattributes, clcommands)

00203 typedef struct PACK
00204 {
00215   struct PACK
00216   {
00217     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;           
00218     uint8_t             type;         
00219     uint8_t             properties;   
00220     ZCL_UTCTime_t       value;        
00221     ZCL_UTCTime_t       minVal;       
00222     ZCL_UTCTime_t       maxVal;       
00223   } time;
00244   struct PACK
00245   {
00246     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;               
00247     uint8_t             type;             
00248     uint8_t             properties;       
00249     struct PACK                           
00250     {
00251       LITTLE_ENDIAN_OCTET(5,(
00252         uint8_t           master        :1, 
00253         uint8_t           synchronized  :1, 
00254         uint8_t           masterZoneDst :1, 
00255         uint8_t           superseding   :1,
00256         uint8_t           reserved      :4  
00257       ))
00258     }value;
00259     uint8_t       minVal;       
00260     uint8_t       maxVal;       
00261   } timeStatus;
00268   struct PACK
00269   {
00270     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;           
00271     uint8_t             type;         
00272     uint8_t             properties;   
00273     int32_t             value;        
00274     int32_t             minVal;       
00275     int32_t             maxVal;       
00276   } timeZone;
00283   struct PACK
00284   {
00285     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;           
00286     uint8_t             type;         
00287     uint8_t             properties;   
00288     uint32_t            value;        
00289     uint32_t            minVal;       
00290     uint32_t            maxVal;       
00291   } dstStart;
00298   struct PACK
00299   {
00300     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;           
00301     uint8_t             type;         
00302     uint8_t             properties;   
00303     uint32_t            value;        
00304     uint32_t            minVal;       
00305     uint32_t            maxVal;       
00306   } dstEnd;
00314   struct PACK
00315   {
00316     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;           
00317     uint8_t             type;         
00318     uint8_t             properties;   
00319     int32_t             value;        
00320     int32_t             minVal;       
00321     int32_t             maxVal;       
00322   } dstShift;
00332   struct PACK
00333   {
00334     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;           
00335     uint8_t             type;         
00336     uint8_t             properties;   
00337     uint32_t            value;        
00338     uint32_t            minVal;       
00339     uint32_t            maxVal;       
00340   } standardTime;
00350   struct PACK
00351   {
00352     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;           
00353     uint8_t             type;         
00354     uint8_t             properties;   
00355     uint32_t            value;        
00356     uint32_t            minVal;       
00357     uint32_t            maxVal;       
00358   } localTime;
00367   struct PACK
00368   {
00369     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;           
00370     uint8_t             type;         
00371     uint8_t             properties;   
00372     ZCL_UTCTime_t       value;        
00373     ZCL_UTCTime_t       minVal;       
00374     ZCL_UTCTime_t       maxVal;       
00375   } lastSetTime;
00385   struct PACK
00386   {
00387     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;           
00388     uint8_t             type;         
00389     uint8_t             properties;   
00390     ZCL_UTCTime_t       value;        
00391     ZCL_UTCTime_t       minVal;       
00392     ZCL_UTCTime_t       maxVal;       
00393   } validUntilTime;
00394   
00395   struct PACK
00396   {
00397     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00398     uint8_t type;
00399     uint8_t properties;
00400     uint16_t value;
00401   } clusterVersion;
00402 } ZCL_TimeClusterServerAttributes_t;
